alert.note: Alert for Choctaw (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 12:51PM CST until January 09 at 1:45PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Choctaw County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 145 PM CST. * At 1251 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sykes, or 10 miles northeast of Quitman, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Butler, Lisman and Pennington. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southwestern Alabama.
